description.@en: You would be surprised what you pick up as a printer—I have a particular knack for learning uncommon tongues.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: You always gain access to use a printing press in any settlement you’re in. In addition, you can attempt to fluently communicate in any language you don’t know with a successful Education Test.
